channel.title: Catherby // Old School // Rsremake 2006 //
channel.description:
[center]OK everyone, there is a reason i made a new thread. Other one was dying. And i wanted to rename it. But never less lets get to this! Catherby was coded by Mini Slurpee. So credits go to him. Me and him teamed up about 3 weeks ago. So a lot of time has been spent into this server. Home is at catherby. You actually work for your items. Mine for ores, then smith it for Armour. Fish and cook for your food! Slayer for better items. Runes to teleport much more! Lets get onto the rest of the server.
[URL=http://"http://runeelite.com/play.php"]CLICK HERE FOR WEBCLIENT[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runeelite.com/client.jar"]CLICK HERE FOR THE JAR[/URL] [URL=http://"http://runeelite.com/download.html"]CLICK HERE FOR THE CLIENT[/URL]
Owners: Gage and Mini Slurpee
If you want to see picture go to our development page. [URL=http://"http://google.com/runescape-development/google/projects/427893-catherby.html"]Here[/URL].
Thanks.
Features - Old school feeling 317 gameframe. - None of those 508+ items added. - Basic teleportation system runes/level required to use. - Flax picking, object dissapear/Reappear when pickng randomly - Normal prayers working( did not add turmoil etc..) - Fishing spots *fishing guild,Karamja,draynor fishing,barbarian village fishing) Transportations - Gnome Glider Fully working all locations exactly as Runescape - Basic teleports - Runes and Magic level required (Home teleport, no magic level required, no runes required. you have to wait 5Minutes before using the home teleport.) - Catherby Ship full working, with custom choices of places to teleport (Karajama, Rock crabs will add a couple more later on.) Non-Combat Skills - Herblore, not full complete, still baisc herblore as usual. - Agility - Not fully complete, but basically enough to master your skill. - Theiving - Not looked into yet, so i haven't started yet. - Crafting - Have to readd the whole skill, it's all messed up. - Fletching - Have to add x5 , x10, X - Slayer - Full working, slayer tower available with slayer master. - Mining - Working, player can mine all ores. - Smithing - Working, x5 x10 X. All armour available to make from Bronze, to Rune. - Fishing - Working, but just have to work on the timers, caching all fish from shrimp to shark. (Fishing shark is currently member) - Cooking - Fully working x5 x10 X has been added supports all fish. - Woodcutting - Little bit glitchy, still have to recode the whole skill. - Farming - Works like a charm. - Runecrafting - Like agility, it's working enough to master you runecrafting skill. Training Locations - Rockcrabs - Lumbridge - Catherby - Falador - Barbarian Village - Lumbridge slayer cave , Relleka slayer dungeon , Slayer tower. Minigames TzTok-jad - Available to obtain a firecape when it's defeated. Dueling arena - Player vs player, staking/Fun Quests Cook's Assisatant
[IMG]http://i.picasion.com/pic56/d8a665257aa6683769eab37a26aa19b2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.picasion.com/pic56/5b9a623380be8acb7a8d139505b12ab0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen13.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen15.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen18.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen19.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/15/13/87/18/screen21.png[/img] Website [URL=http://"http://runeelite.com"]Here![/URL] [URL=http://"http://runeelite.com/play.php"]PLAY WEBCLIENT HERE[/URL][/center]

item.title: Catherby // Old School // Rsremake 2006 //
item.dc:creator: @yellowtopk yellowtopk
item.description:
@yellowtopk wrote:

[center]OK everyone, there is a reason i made a new thread. Other one was dying. And i wanted to rename it. But never less lets get to this! Catherby was coded by Mini Slurpee. So credits go to him. Me and him teamed up about 3 weeks ago. So a lot of time has been spent into this server. Home is at catherby. You actually work for your items. Mine for ores, then smith it for Armour. Fish and cook for your food! Slayer for better items. Runes to teleport much more! Lets get onto the rest of the server.

CLICK HERE FOR WEBCLIENT
CLICK HERE FOR THE JAR
CLICK HERE FOR THE CLIENT

Owners: Gage and Mini Slurpee

If you want to see picture go to our development page. Here.

Thanks.

Features

  • Old school feeling 317 gameframe.
  • None of those 508+ items added.
  • Basic teleportation system runes/level required to use.
  • Flax picking, object dissapear/Reappear when pickng randomly
  • Normal prayers working( did not add turmoil etc…)
  • Fishing spots *fishing guild,Karamja,draynor fishing,barbarian village fishing)
    Transportations
  • Gnome Glider Fully working all locations exactly as Runescape
  • Basic teleports - Runes and Magic level required (Home teleport, no magic level required, no runes required. you have to wait 5Minutes before using the home teleport.)
  • Catherby Ship full working, with custom choices of places to teleport (Karajama, Rock crabs will add a couple more later on.)
    Non-Combat Skills
  • Herblore, not full complete, still baisc herblore as usual.
  • Agility - Not fully complete, but basically enough to master your skill.
  • Theiving - Not looked into yet, so i haven’t started yet.
  • Crafting - Have to readd the whole skill, it’s all messed up.
  • Fletching - Have to add x5 , x10, X
  • Slayer - Full working, slayer tower available with slayer master.
  • Mining - Working, player can mine all ores.
  • Smithing - Working, x5 x10 X. All armour available to make from Bronze, to Rune.
  • Fishing - Working, but just have to work on the timers, caching all fish from shrimp to shark. (Fishing shark is currently member)
  • Cooking - Fully working x5 x10 X has been added supports all fish.
  • Woodcutting - Little bit glitchy, still have to recode the whole skill.
  • Farming - Works like a charm.
  • Runecrafting - Like agility, it’s working enough to master you runecrafting skill.
    Training Locations
  • Rockcrabs
  • Lumbridge
  • Catherby
  • Falador
  • Barbarian Village
  • Lumbridge slayer cave , Relleka slayer dungeon , Slayer tower.
    Minigames
    TzTok-jad - Available to obtain a firecape when it’s defeated.
    Dueling arena - Player vs player, staking/Fun
    Quests
    Cook’s Assisatant















Website Here!
PLAY WEBCLIENT HERE[/center]
